message:
http://ksamykandil.blogspot.com/

Your comments are highly appreciated, thank you all
name: Khaled Kandil
caption: ksamykandil.blogspot.com

data.message:
Nice work, just a few nitpicks. The jQuery post really needs syntax highlighting.
Add context to the diagram, it's floating out in the wild like that, maybe push it up in the post and reference it in your text. Also, the image file name Untitled.png could use a more appropriate name.

I checked this first time on a mobile and was a tad confused, you're Khaled Samy, that's the author's name stated in your posts but then you link to your linkedin account at Khaled Kandil.

Sometime in the near future - I wish you the best of luck - when you become an authoritative voice in which ever field of knowledge you work in, you'd really wish you had a single clear identity online. Who are you? Are you Khaled Kandil, or are you K. Samy Kandil or are you Khaled Samy? Can't be the three.
Hady Ahmed I really appreciate your comments and I will start working on them. Thank you so much for your time.

You can use GitHub's Gists to embed code with highlighting
https://gist.github.com/
Amr Eldib Thank you, I will check it
